stimulusHtml: Both the representation of the king’s coral beads and the use of brass in the wall plaque from Oba’s palace serve to communicate which of the following?
choicesHtml: The Benin conquest of enemies, who controlled African copper and coral
The impending marriage of the Benin king to the daughter of an allied ruler
The wealth coming to the Benin Kingdom through trade with the Portuguese
The migration of the Benin from the East African mountains to the coast of West Africa
